1.content: How will Mr. Lancer gain weight?
1.title: Choose his gaining path

11.content: Mr. Lancer was doing the usual acting like a seemingly unexciting faculty member for the sake of not being bothered by teenagers but deep inside his head there's an exciting part to him which is his nak for eating huge amounts of food! As he counted the time till school ended he wondered what great food he should eat! RING!! that was his que! He hopped into his car and raced back home then immediately opened his fridge to start putting away some food into his stomach! Lancer went to the dinner table and placed the mountain of food he grabbed down on the table and started scarfing down the food! He grabbed a hot dog and swallowed it in one gulp and he felt it hit his stomach "ahh!" he replied. He ate five TV dinners in a matter of minutes drum sticks gone, a pizza, and to finish it off a nice big steak! Lancer sat back and stared at the remains of the giant mount of food he ate and belched pleasantly then rubbed his distended stomach with two hands in a circular motion. The feeling of all the food in his stomach was extremely satisfying he loved the feeling of large mouthfuls of food going through his bearded mouth down his thick throat then dropping into his ample stomach. He started getting sleepy as a result of his labor so he went to his bed room, laid down, unfastened his belt and stroked his stomach until he drifted off into sleep.
11.title: lots of eating :P

111.content:
At school the next day, Mr. Lancer noticed he'd been getting some strange looks from the other teachers and students and it took him a while to realize that it was because one of the buttons on his shirt had blown off and a few inches of his hairy gut was visible. "Crap!" He said to himself as he ducked into the nearest men's restroom, "this must have happened second period. I remember feeling a relief of pressure down there as I sat down but I never thought I could be outgrowing shirts already. What am I gonna do the rest of the day? I know I'll staple it!"
Hurridly Mr. Lancer ran back to his classroom with his hands awkwardly covering the gap and awkwardly scrambled to staple the two flaps of his shirt together without anyone noticing. "Phew."
"Mr. Lancer," came a voice from behind, "Having fun over there?" It was Danny Fenton, the secret object of Mr. Lancer's affections.
Mr. Lancer turned around and started to smile but remembered he had to keep up the act of being mean at least until he had Danny's trust. "Yes, yes I was having fun Mr. Fenton," Lancer said meanly, "Now get to class!" He then stormed off to the cafeteria for lunch. The rest of the day went smoothly for Lancer, and luckily it was Friday so he was free to stuff himself all weekend long.
111.title: Button Problems

choices: ...to the detention room, where Danny was the only kid there.
...to the parking lot to head home (or to get some food).
...to the locker room, where he found Dash.
1112.content:
Over the weekend Mr. Lancer purchased for himself another set of clothes, identical to the ones he already owned but a size larger, hoping that it would solve his growing problem. To his surprise, however, after another week of glorious stuffing Friday came around and his new clothes were already feeling snug! It wasn't noticeable unless one were to look but his shirt neatly hugged his round belly and his growing but was well defined against his pants.

Mr. Lancer was deeply trying to bare through the rest of the day. It was the final period before dismissal and he was starving for something to eat and it made him rather stern. He was sitting at his desk as the various students completed their classwork when he caught Danny Fenton staring in his direction. He took his eyes off his book and said "Eyes on your work, Fenton," however the slight movement he made to look up caused his stomach to let out a growl which received some snickers from some students. Danny quickly looked down and Lancer could have sworn his face was a shade redder, but he shook it off telling himself it would be best not to entertain his fantasies involving the cute boy. Besides his position as teacher, it would be unlikely he could balance a passion for the boy with a passion for the food that happens to keep his belly big and round. In other words, who would want a fat man like him?

The bell for dismissal rang and students went up to hand in their work. Danny was the last one to hand in his work and as he turned it in Danny sneaked a look at Lancer's growing belly. Lancer's eyes on the other hand, were averted so as to not accidentally focus on the subtle bulge in his student's pants. A minute or so after Danny left, Lancer packed up his bags and made a mad dash for the vending machine where he got three bags of chips to hold down his appetite until he could sit down with his second lunch he had prepared. He made sure to pick the tastiest ones in the machine, knowing very well that they were also the fattiest. Lancer did not really care though, so long as his gut was happy he was happy. One of the bags he nearly downed on the spot, and fortunately nobody was around to see it. After that, he went....
1112.title: Skip to next Friday.

11122.content:
Alright, he got to the parking lot and into his car(with a bit difficultly) .

So... now what? Does he go out to eat or go home and maybe eat there?
11122.title: ...to the parking lot to head home (or to get s...

choices: as if he was being watched...
111221.content:
Despite having eaten all those bags of chips, when Lancer squeezed into his car his stomach let out another hungry growl. Mr. Lancer felt as if he would pass out from hunger before making it home, so he decided to pull into the drive in. He ordered 6 cheeseburgers, 3 large fries, 2 chicken sandwiches, 4 sundaes and 2 large cokes. On the way back he munched on his feast, unable to hold back. When he pulled up at his house he had eaten 2 burgers, 1 of the fries and half a coke.

Lancer unbuckled his seat belt, sighing in relief as the pressure was taken off his belly. He rushed inside as fast as his girth would let him and immediately threw himself onto the couch and pulled up a table upon which he laid his food. Seeing as nobody was around, he slipped off his shirt, letting his gut flop out. Looking down at it Lancer noticed how it strained against the button of his pants, so he unbuttoned it and let his gut free. From there he went about devouring his food, consuming half a burger in a single bite. Each time a massive chunk of greasy food slid down into his belly it added a growing pressure that felt beyond sublime to him and caused him to crave more, more more!

Quickly the pile dwindled down. Lancer laid back onto his couch and rubbed his swollen belly, sinking his fingers into the softness that was now firm from being stuffed. He looked at it, finding himself surprisingly pleased with how much it had grown. Each added pound, along with the grease and crumbs on his belly, was like a trophy of the gluttony he was so very fond of. After 10 minutes of rubbing his belly, Lancer looked up. He suddenly felt...
111221.title: Go out to eat.

choices: Notice a mouth-watering smell coming from his glowing kitchen.
Pulled his phone up and ordered a banquet to his home.
1112211.content: ...his stomach roaring like a angry lion! Lancer down at his rotund gut in surprise for a second before wincing as he felt the painful pangs of hunger assaulting him. Getting back up and off the couch, Lancer could not focus on anything else besides filling his stomach at the moment. Hurried to silence his still loudly grumbling stomach, Lancer...
1112211.title: hungry again!

choices: The hunger was to much, he black out.
He bear with it. He entered his kitchen with numerous food floating about.
11122111.content: The most heavenly, mouth watering aroma attacked his nose without warning. Without barely thinking, he followed the delectable scent to his ghostly glowing green kitchen without thinking too much about it. His hunger pangs grew more unbearable, his paunch growling to be filled...
11122111.title: Notice a mouth-watering smell coming from his g...

112.content:
He had the most amazing dream he ever had!

He was in school, and practically everyone he saw kept bringing food to him and feed him! In his dream, an hour had passed, and he had became a 3,000 ball of blubber!

Than, he dremt that someone proposed to him! He couldn't make it out, but he thought it was...
112.title: Later that night...

choices: He wakes up several times bigger and heavier
1121.content: *he saw Jack Fenton proposing to him while rubbing his huge belly and moobs, he realized that in reality Jack may have a crush on him and desires him to grow huge, he sleep ate everything from the fridge and heads to bed mega fat and heavy*
1121.title: Jack Fenton

choices: He gorges even more and becomes a huge and total slobby hog*
11211.content: *waking up from a wonderful dream a now 949lb Mr lancer yawns hugely before rising from bed giving his ginormous belly and moobs a playful rub* ahh nothing like being near Immobile to get someone like me so turned on *his voice is so much deeper* *he waddles really heavily to a massive buffet at the nasty burger and eats for several months*
11211.title: He wakes up several times bigger and heavier

12.content:
"Oh, Boy! Another box of chocolates!!" Said Mr. Lancer as he sat at his desk with a big smile on his face. He openes the box and ate a piece of chocolate, and as he ate, he found a note in the box and it said,

"Dear Mr. Lancer,

I think it's time we finally met. Meet me in 'Nasty Burger' after school. Look for me, i'll be holding a single red rose."

Signed, your "Special Someone"

"My 'Special Someone' huh?" Said Mr. Lancer finishing the last piece of chocolate, licking his fingers and patting his very big belly that bounced with each pat. He glanced down at his rather large gut and remembered that just a week ago, just before that first box of chocolates, he had a lot less of a gut. "Well, whoever my 'Secret Someone' is, they do like to keep me well-fed. I cant wait to meet 'em!" He said with a belch! "Oh! Excuse Me!! Well, at least no one was here to see that. That would have been emberassasing" He said, while rubbing his soft belly.
12.title: A Special Someone for Mr. Lancer

122.content:
The final bell rang and students rushed out of their classes. Mr. Lancer was also eager to get out, and for once it wasn't just because of his loathing for students. He picked up his bags from the teachers lounge, and to his surprise he found when he got to his car another box of chocolates with a note attached reading "See you at the Nasty Burger ". Grinning more than he'd care to most days, Lancer hopped in the car and drove to the Nasty Burger, munching on the chocolates on the way there.

It was a little awkward for Mr. Lancer to be at the Nasty Burger, seeing as it was a prime hangout for students, but since it was a Wednesday it wasn't very populated. Lancer paced around for a minute before finding someone holding a rose shyly in a corner. To his surprise, it was...
122.title: skip right to "Nasty Burger"

choices: “Tell me what you’ve been up to lately.”
1221.content:
Danny Fenton, Mr. Lancer’s former student, sitting alone at a table for two by a window. The young man had been away at college for several years, and he was far from the frail, unusually small fourteen-year-old Lancer remembered him as. He had gotten much taller, but he was still slender except for his midsection, where he had a small but noticeable belly. His black hair was combed back, and his blue eyes were brighter than ever before.

Mr. Lancer took a deep breath, then walked over to Danny, who was deep in a daydream, idly twirling the rose in his hands. Mr. Lancer flashed a mischievous grin, then bumped Danny with his big belly.

Danny snapped out of his daydream with a gasped. He looked at Mr. Lancer’s belly and blushed bright red. A bulge formed in his pants, which he crossed his legs to hide.

Mr. Lancer sat down across from Danny, making the seat creak from his weight.

“Hey Mr. Lancer, it’s been a while,” Danny with a grin said as he handed his former teacher the rose.

Mr. Lancer happily took the rose. “It‘s been too long,” he agreed. He smelled the rose and smirked. “You’ve grown a lot since the last time we saw each other.”

Danny chuckled. “So have you,” he said, still blushing, his eyes fixed on Mr. Lancer’s huge belly.

Mr. Lancer chuckled. “Of course I have,” he said, “All those chocolates and sweets you’ve given me have really fattened me up.” He patted his belly, which jiggled and wobbled with his touch.

Danny almost melted. His fantasies were coming true; not only did Mr. Lancer enjoy gaining weight, but it was highly likely he returned Danny’s attractions.

“Are you alright?” Mr. Lancer asked.

“Yeah... I’m fine...” Danny said, dazed. He leaned over the table to whisper to Mr. Lancer.

“I just wanna rub my hands all over your belly. I want to rest my head on it and use it as a pillow. I want to feed you and make you bigger.” He cringed, then quickly added, “As long as that’s what you want.”

Mr. Lancer chuckled. “Of course that’s what I want. But first,”
1221.title: Danny Fenton

1222.content:
He saw Danny Fenton's dad, Jack, which he had on his trademark orange suit, but with a neck tie tied around his neck!

Now, no body knew this...but Mr. Lancer had a thing for big guys, and Jack was the biggest guy he ever knew!

Mr. Lancer lumbered over to where Jack was sitting and sat in the booth, lifting his fat gut and then dropping on the table with a loud THUD!

"I was wondering when you'd show!" Said Jack, as he was admiring Mr. Lancer's big belly and giving him the rose.

"To be honest, I wasn't really expecting to see you here." Mr. Lancer said with a smile, than smelling the rose.
1222.title: Jack Fenton

info.brief_description: Make the teacher/vice principal from Danny Phantom as fat as you want!
info.description:
Rules
1. Mr. Lancer and other adult men can gain weight
2. Adult men CANNOT be fatter than Mr. Lancer
3. No weight limit
4. Only Mr. Lancer and other adult men are gay
5. No sex; only hugging, kissing, touching
6. Have everyone in character
7. No vore
8. No killing of Lancer or other characters
9. Any form of weight gain allowed; magic, eating, ect.
10. No females in story, only men and teens
11. No body growth; no hands, feet, height gain ect., weight only
12. Add and have fun!
